text:
@marcorubio No No No No No No No

Protesters DID NOT cause COVID-19 spike. They wore masks. 

It was people NOT WEARING MASKS along with Memorial Day “festivities” AND OPENING TOO FAST & TOO DUMB. 

Too bad Gov. Cuomo isn’t our governor, huh?
